descriptor.name: PMFBY Crop Insurance Advisor
descriptor.short_desc: Guide farmers through the process of insuring their crops under the PM Fasal Bima Yojana.
descriptor.long_desc:
Course Overview:
This module focuses on the Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY). Agents will learn about the enrollment process, premium calculation for different crops (Kharif, Rabi), understanding the scope of coverage against natural calamities, and the procedure for claim intimation and settlement.

list.value: All farmers, including sharecroppers and tenant farmers
